title: 08/27/2021 - HOUR 3 - Geoff Schwartz
itunes:title: 08/27/2021 - HOUR 3 - Geoff Schwartz
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--welcomes FOX Sports football analyst and former NFL offensive lineman Geoff Schwartz to the program to share his season outlook on a handful of intriguing NFL teams. Plus, Doug lays out his five picks for college football's Week 0 in "Best For Last."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
